items.title: Suspect in Macklemore Robbery Also Stole From Sports Stars, Prosecutors Say
items.summary: Patrick Maisonet’s targets in the Seattle area included the baseball Hall of Famer Ichiro Suzuki and the former football star Richard Sherman, officials said.

items.title: Justice Amy Coney Barrett Argues Her Own Case, and the Court’s, in New Book
items.summary: In a new book, Justice Amy Coney Barrett asks for faith in the Supreme Court but reveals very little.

items.title: Health Dept. Plans Vaccine Poll Run by Trump Ally’s Firm
items.summary: The no-bid contract was published amid Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s effort to move the nation’s health infrastructure away from some vaccines.

items.title: Venezuelan Jets Fly Over U.S. Navy Ship in Show of Force
items.summary: The flyover took place two days after the United States carried out a military strike on a boat in the Caribbean that U.S. officials said was carrying drugs.

items.title: Biden Has Surgery to Remove Skin Cancer Lesions
items.summary: Three months earlier, former President Joseph R. Biden Jr. had a diagnosis of an aggressive form of prostate cancer.

items.title: Trump Is Exploring Ways to Take Over the Sept. 11 Memorial and Museum
items.summary: It was unclear exactly how the federal government would take control of the site in Lower Manhattan. As a candidate, Mr. Trump offered a preview of one potential option.

items.title: Trump plans to sign executive order to rename Pentagon to ‘Department of War’ – as it happened
items.summary: <p>Order would authorize Pete Hegseth, the defense secretary, to introduce legislation to revert to pre-1947 name. This blog is now closed.</p><p><strong>Health secretary Robert F</strong><strong> Kennedy Jr</strong><strong> will appear before a congressional committee on Thursday, where he’s expected to face questions about turmoil at federal health agencies.</strong></p><p>The US Senate finance committee has called Kennedy to a hearing about his plans to “Make America Healthy Again”.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/sep/04/donald-trump-tariffs-immigration-technology-epstein-us-politics-live-news-updates">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: Trump’s LA national guard deployment cost taxpayers $120m, Newsom says
items.summary: <p>California governor condemns decision to deploy troops in response to anti-Ice protests as ‘waste, fraud and abuse’ </p><p>Donald Trump’s deployment of the national guard in Los Angeles in response to protests in the city over immigration raids cost taxpayers nearly $120m, the California governor’s office said on Thursday.</p><p>The US president sent 2,000 national guard troops into the city in June amid clashes between federal immigration agents and protesters. This week a <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/02/trumps-national-guard-troops-los-angeles-illegal">judge ruled</a> that dispatching the military to accompany authorities on immigration enforcement operations violated federal law.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/04/trump-national-guard-deployment-los-angeles">Continue reading...</a>
